Name: Bunny Triggered
Title: Amber: Bunny Triggered
Source: Reward for inviting Amber to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Bunny Triggered
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1304]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1304] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13042]</color> once.
After you use a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113041]</color> are still on the field, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113041]</color> explodes and deals 4 $[K103].
(You must have $[A1304] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C113041.Name: Baron Bunny
C113041.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character takes DMG: </color>Decrease DMG taken by 2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>. When the Usages are depleted, this card will not be discarded.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>At the End Phase, if $[K3] have been depleted:</color> Discard this card to deal 2 $[K103].

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
